title: Minecraft Cracked 1.7.2 [Auto Install] [Updatable] [SMP/Single P
description:
Minecraft is a sandbox construction game created by Markus Persson, the founder of Mojang. The game involves 
players creating and destroying various types of blocks in a three dimensional environment. The player takes 
an avatar that can destroy or create blocks, forming fantastic structures, creations and artwork across the 
various multiplayer servers in multiple game modes. Minecraft's official release date was the 18th of November 
2011. Minecraft is available for purchase to players at Mojang's official website.

HOW TO INSTALL: 

1. Double click the "Minecraft Installer.exe" and click Extract when you are prompted.  
2. Your Minecraft Shortcut will be located on your desktop.  Enjoy.

ADVANCED INSTALLATION METHOD:

1. Open WinRAR, Click: File > Open Archive.  Change File Type to "All Files", Locate Minecraft Installer.exe  (Skip to step 3)
2. Alternatively if you have WinRAR integrated into your shell, right click the MCInstaller.exe and choose "Open with WinRAR"
4. Run Minecraft.exe, drop down version to 1.7.2, click Force clean, and click Play
5. Close minecraft
6. Go to Start > Run (Search bar for Vista and 7), Type %appdata% and hit Enter
7. Drag and drop the everything from WinRAR into the ".minecraft" folder
8. Make a shortcut to minecraft.exe
9. Enjoy.

BreadKraft, a wheat based alternative! What is BreadKraft? It's a 24/7 dedicated Minecraft SMP server with a lag free zone, very active staff and friendly community. BreadKraft is a survival/pvp type server which tries to bring out vanilla-esq flavour of minecraft whilst enhancing core features of miencraft (survival, PvP, Building and exploration) via a variety of plugins such as Towny, LWC, Dynamic Difficulty, HyperEconomy, and many more. What else? Well, we also have many fun mini games such as Mario Kart, Capture The Flag, Spleef, and more! Go ahead, hop on our server at mc.breadkraft.net and enjoy your new found addiction.

Our server is U.S based.
